summary: Website project with requirement to export full source code and provide a cPanel-compatible static HTML version; domain connection/publishing on Caffeine/Internet Computer is also in scope.
architectural_notes: Current hosting context is Caffeine/Internet Computer (icp0.io), which differs from cPanel hosting; static export may be needed for cPanel compatibility.
known_issues: Caffeine site is currently in draft mode; user needs to publish/make live to obtain the icp0.io link for domain DNS connection.

existing_features.title: Add npm scripts to generate a production static build suitable for cPanel upload and to package both deliverables (full source ZIP and static-build ZIP) in a single command.

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide a downloadable ZIP of the entire website React project/source code.
Convert the whole website into a static HTML/CSS/JS package suitable for uploading to cPanel (option 3 = both).

Add an in-repo export guide (EXPORT.md) that explains how to obtain (1) the full React source code as a ZIP and (2) a cPanel-ready static HTML/CSS/JS build, using clear step-by-step instructions in English.
Ensure the static build output uses correct relative/absolute asset paths so that it works when hosted from a typical cPanel public_html root (no broken links to CSS/JS/images).
